Package View

Package containing all classes related to the view of the program
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    CollectionDetailView  
    CollectionPeekView
    The view associated with CollectionView that "peeks" at the collection
    CollectionView
    Lists the user's collections as CollectionPeekView(s)
    CreatePoster
    Class to create and return a poster image for the passed in movie.
    HomeView
    Class to create a JPanel for the HomeView that the user is able to search and sort/filter through all the movies in the database
    LoginWindow  
    MainWindow
    Class to generate a JFrame that will contain all views in the program and will allow switching between said views IS A STATIC SINGLETON CLASS
    MovieGrid
    Class to create a JPanel that shows a grid of movie posters based on the passed in collection Can be used anywhere that a grid of movies needs to be shown
    MovieView
    Class to generate a JPanel that displays all the information about the specified movie Also allows the user to rate the shown movie, as well as add it to one of their collections
    PosterText
    Class to create an Icon based on the passed in text
    SearchPanel
    Class to create a search panel used to search through the movie database and display the login button
    SortFilterPanel
    Class to create a panel to sort and filter the movies currently shown on the screen Allows the user to use both sorting and filtering simultaneously for the current movies.
    WrapLayout
    FlowLayout subclass that fully supports wrapping of components.
